content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[bikehire_db]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
--drop table [bikehire_db]
--drop table [trial2]
CREATE TABLE dbo.[bikehire_db]
	(
	 [VendorID] INT,
	 [tpep_pickup_datetime] datetime,
	 [tpep_dropoff_datetime] datetime,
	 [trip_distance] FLOAT,
	 [PULocationID] INT,
	 [DOLocationID] INT,
	 [trip_time] FLOAT,
	 [trip_speed] FLOAT
	)
	WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_[trial]
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.[bikehire_db]
(VendorID 1, tpep_pickup_datetime 2, tpep_dropoff_datetime 3, trip_distance 4, PULocationID 5, DOLocationID 6, trip_time 7, trip_speed 8)
FROM 'https://datalakedemodp203.dfs.core.windows.net/csv/draft.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.[bikehire_db]
GO

SELECT DISTINCT(trip_speed) FROM dbo.[bikehire_db]
order by 1 desc
